reload_popup.description: Please reload the page to use Viva Translate.

failed_live_cc.description: An error occurred starting capturing the Live CC in the current browser tab. Please reload the page and try again.

unknown_error.description: An unknown error occurred. Please reload the page and try again. If the problem persists, please contact us.

options_popup.translation_error: There was an error in the translation
options_popup.input_placeholder: Write something in any of the supported languages

meetings.deactivate_popup_text: You can re-enable transcripts by clicking on the Viva icon and activating the option.

explanation.cc: Show Viva like subtitles in a movie
explanation.side_panel: Fit Viva's box where its most convenient in your Google meeting
explanation.minimize: Minimize Viva if you don't want to see the box. It will keep translating unless you pause
explanation.summary: Check out the summary section to get structured notes for your session

viva_messages.microphone_target: Your audio is being transcribed to
viva_messages.speaker_target: The meeting is being transcribed to
viva_messages.pause_transcript: Your transcript has been paused. You will not receive any transcriptions or translations.
viva_messages.resume_transcript: Viva will now start transcribing and translating! ðŸ¤©

settings.title: Settings
settings.show_own_transcription: Turn on if you want to see your transcriptions

summaries.placeholder: No auto-generated summaries yet. They will appear during your conversation.

tooltips.pause_suggestion: Viva will continue transcribing the meeting. If you'd like to pause the transcription, click the pause icon in the top left of the transcript window.

connection_error.message: Your network connection is lost. We are trying to reconnect.

errors.invalid_lang: Please try writing a longer sentence in Portuguese, Spanish or English
errors.selection_error: The selection couldn't be translated, please try again with a larger piece of text.
errors.try_again: Couldn't complete the translation, please try again.
